name: Farms of Ancestry
description:
Embark on a journey to uncover the secrets of your ancestry as you tend to the fertile lands of your forefathers. In Farms of Ancestry, immerse yourself in a serene and contemplative world as you cultivate crops, raise livestock, and build relationships with the townspeople. With stunning visuals and a relaxing soundtrack, this farming simulator offers a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. As you progress, you will unlock the hidden stories of your ancestors, revealing the rich history of the land and the families who once called it home. Experience the simple pleasures of farm life and discover the beauty of your heritage in Farms of Ancestry.

Submission for the GGJ 2023.
